column2: dplyr::select(., subjects, condition,  pre, post, post_diff, signal)%>%
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'subjects', 'alpha_pos_condition'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
ggplot(dat2plot1, aes(x = interaction(time,condition), y = amplitude_induced, fill = condition)) +
stat_summary(fun.y=mean, aes(ymin=..y.., ymax=..y.., color =condition), geom='errorbar', width=0.9, size=1.5) +
subtitle="collapsed across stimulus colors and positions")+
